cast.overview: When the popular, restless Landon Carter is forced to participate in the school drama production, he falls in love with Jamie Sullivan, the daughter of the town's minister. Jamie has a "to-do" list for her life, as well as a very big secret she must keep from Landon.
cast.title: A Walk to Remember

details.biography: Jason Paige (born January 6, 1969) is a dynamic performer, songwriter, and voice artist best known for singing the iconic Pokémon theme song, which has become a cultural anthem for fans worldwide. Beyond his unforgettable contribution to the Pokémon franchise, Jason has lent his powerful voice to countless commercials, albums, and live performances. A true showman, he continues to captivate audiences with his energy and versatility, leaving his mark on both nostalgic favorites and fresh creative projects.
details.name: Jason Paige
